name: Parkour 3310
description:
Controls:

W - Jump

A D - Move

Space - Change Light

Enter - Start / Next Level

I really hope you enjoy my game. This is the first game jam I have finished and my first game on itch.io. The game was made for the nokia 3310 game jam, and I tried to implement the optional theme of on/off by making a platformer, in which you can interact with different stuff, depending on the light that you can switch.
